lead_paragraph: KRAMBERG--Joachim, died January 13 just two weeks shy of his 102 birthday. Beloved father of Andre and Robert, grandfather of Julia and Ryan, father-in-law of Pamela and uncle of Abe and David. He was born in Tarnopol, Poland January 27, 1914. Holocaust survivor who came to the United States in 1951, bought Maple View Farm in Southington, CT where he learned to raise chickens. Moved the family to New York in 1962 where he became a successful licensed electrical contractor. A remarkable man who exemplified perseverance and a positive attitude, he will be sorely missed by all who knew him. 1/3
